thread.title: Trump BLASTS major US clothing store after it dumps daughter Ivanka's clothing brand
thread.title_full: Trump BLASTS major US clothing store after it dumps daughter Ivanka's clothing brand

title: Trump BLASTS major US clothing store after it dumps daughter Ivanka's clothing brand
text:
The chain owns more than 330 outlets across the US My daughter Ivanka has been treated unfairly Donald Trump 
But Nordstrom, based in Seattle, Washington, was not the only shop to axe the Ivanka Trump range. 
Smaller retailers such as Neiman Marcus, Belk, Jet and ShopStyle also dropped Ivanka’s brand amid a social media frenzy surrounding the #GrabYourWallet campaign, aimed at boycotting businesses the Trump family profits from. 
A Nordstrom spokesman said: “Over the past year, and particularly in the last half of 2016, sales of the brand have steadily declined to the point where it didn’t make good business sense for us to continue with the line for now. 
“We’ve had a great relationship with the Ivanka Trump team.” 
And President Trump’s press secretary Sean Spicer lashed out at the huge chain, claiming the move to drop Ms Trump’s brand is a “direct attack” on the Commander-in-Chief. GETTY Trump's press secretary Sean Spicer claimed the move was a 'direct attack' on the President 
But the brutal move, which happened earlier this week , sparked massive boycotts from outraged Trump supporters. 
One sympathiser tweeted Nordstrom’s official account, blasting claims the move to axe the Trump brand was politically motivated. Being President Trump: Key Moments Fri, February 3, 2017
